file_content.text: Captain! It is a great relief to see you well in spite of the extensive fighting.
I'm afraid that Jorgan sustained heavy injuries during our retreat from the bridge.
Despite my efforts to absorb enemy fire, he refused to give up his portion of the fight--a perfect example of Republic heroism.
Full situation report--what's Jorgan's status?
Will he be alright?
Damn you, Jorgan. Why'd you have to be so reckless?
What was he thinking?
I should've known Jorgan wouldn't pull back without a fight.
Stubborn to the end.
I'm afraid that Dorne was injured terribly while we were fighting our way back to the ship.
I attempted to absorb as much incoming fire as possible, but she refused to hide--she insisted on ensuring that I returned as well.
What's her status? Is she going to make it?
Will she be alright?
Damn you, Dorne. Always worrying about everyone but yourself.
What was she thinking?
I should've known Dorne wouldn't fall back without some regulation Imp-stomping.
A perfectionist to the end.
How could so many Imperials sneak up on you?
I want an explanation!
The Imperials' approach was not stealthy--we knew they were coming but could not abandon our objective of collecting the bridge computer data.
I've stabilized him for now, sir--but the wounds would certainly have been fatal had Forex not gotten him to me so quickly. Jorgan is lucky to be alive.
Stay with him and keep me updated on his status.
Keep an eye on Jorgan.
Of course, Captain.
You did a good job, getting Jorgan out of there.
Well done, Forex.
If Forex had done a better job, Jorgan wouldn't have needed help at all.
That's not good enough.
It's been a long time since medical basics, but Yuun and I managed to patch her up. If Forex hadn't gotten her back so fast, we would've lost her.
Make sure she's stable and update me if anything changes.
Keep an eye on Dorne.
Sure thing, Captain.
It was very brave of you to get Dorne out of there.
Well done, Forex.
The Republic does not leave its heroes behind. I did only what duty required.
If Forex had kept Dorne covered, she wouldn't be in this condition.
That's not good enough.
I... did the best I was able, Captain. If my service is unsatisfactory, perhaps I am in need of mechanical or programming upgrades.
Could we talk about this later? I need to set those charges off, and we shouldn't be sitting in the hangar bay when I do.
Let's get moving--double-time it!
Agreed.
Let's get out of here and finish this.
The mission is almost over.
Agreed! Let's show the Empire the result of their assaults on liberty and democracy!
We have one wounded--that's it. Everyone focus so we can finish what we started.
Get a grip, people.
Agreed--let's destroy this insult to freedom and democracy once and for all!
Yuun will see that the ship is prepared for launch. Once we are clear of the Gauntlet, we can contact Admiral Helik with a situation report.
We will grind the Empire's weapon into dust beneath the heel of liberty!
